ygData.subject: RE: the last bubble is harder
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, it was bandied about for quite some time on other lists that this was in fact Norrathian Urban Legend in the past, but that when Verant decided to
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, it was bandied about for quite some time on other lists that this
was in fact Norrathian Urban Legend in the past, but that when Verant
decided to cut the experience loss for dying but still had hard core factins
that wanted total experience to gain a level raised to compensate, it was
decided to add that extra experience totally to the last bubble to make it
harder to detect. The logic was if people already think this is true, who
will notice that now when they test it they can prove it really is true.
Not sure how likely this is but I did start to do some testing to find out,
maybe I will get back to that and see just what that last bubble holds in
secrets after all.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: David Knadler [mailto:dknadler@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 12:57 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] the last bubble is harder
Importance: Low


From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>

I think we can definitely chock that up to Norrathian Urban Legend. :)

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
